title: Is AMD Vega 56 Really Worth It In 2018?
description: AMD's Vega 56 has been out for almost a year and now that prices have come down, we decided to run some updated performance tests to see if Radeon fans should finally buy it or save some money and grab the RX 580. Also, since NVIDIA's GTX 1070's price lies right between these two, we decided to throw it into the benchmark comparison too.   Massdrop + Sennheiser PC 37X (Best Gaming Headset) -   Newegg.com Affiliate Links for Team Group Memory (Sponsor):  Xcalibur 3600MHz:   Xcalibur 4000MHz:    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  EVGA GTX 1070 SC -  Zotac GTX 1070 Mini -  Gigabyte GTX 1070 Windforce -  MSI GTX 1070 Armor OC -  ------------- Sapphire VEGA 56 Pulse -  Gigabyte VEGA 56 -  ASUS ROG VEGA 56 OC -  PowerColor VEGA 56 -  ------------- ASUS RX 580 DUAL OC -  Sapphire RX 580 Pulse -  AORUS RX 580 -  XFX RX 580 XXX Edition -   MSI RX 580 ARMOR OC -  ------------- Core i7 8700K -  Toshiba RC100 NVMe Drive -    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by AsRock / Sapphire. This video is sponsored by Toshiba OCZ & Massdrop. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates!
